verses.esv: 27 that they should seek God, and perhaps feel their way toward him and find him. Yet he is actually not far from each one of us,
verses.kjv: 27 That they should seek the Lord, if haply they might feel after him, and find him, though he be not far from every one of us:
verses.niv: 27 God did this so that men would seek him and perhaps reach out for him and find him, though he is not far from each one of us.

verses.esv: 13 You will seek me and find me, when you seek me with all your heart.
verses.kjv: 13 And ye shall seek me, and find me, when ye shall search for me with all your heart.
verses.niv: 13 You will seek me and find me when you seek me with all your heart.

verses.esv:
17   I love those who love me,
    and those who seek me diligently find me.
verses.kjv: 17 I love them that love me; and those that seek me early shall find me.
verses.niv: 17 I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

verses.esv: 29 But from there you will seek the LORD your God and you will find him, if you search after him with all your heart and with all your soul.
verses.kjv: 29 But if from thence thou shalt seek the LORD thy God, thou shalt find him, if thou seek him with all thy heart and with all thy soul.
verses.niv: 29 But if from there you seek the LORD your God, you will find him if you look for him with all your heart and with all your soul.

verses.esv: 8 For everyone who asks receives, and the one who seeks finds, and to the one who knocks it will be opened.
verses.kjv: 8 For every one that asketh receiveth; and he that seeketh findeth; and to him that knocketh it shall be opened.
verses.niv: 8 For everyone who asks receives; he who seeks finds; and to him who knocks, the door will be opened.

verses.esv: 7 “Ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.
verses.kjv: 7 Ask, and it shall be given you; seek, and ye shall find; knock, and it shall be opened unto you:
verses.niv: 7 "Ask and it will be given to you; seek and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.

verses.esv: 3 Call to me and I will answer you, and will tell you great and hidden things that you have not known.
verses.kjv: 3 Call unto me, and I will answer thee, and shew thee great and mighty things, which thou knowest not.
verses.niv: 3 'Call to me and I will answer you and tell you great and unsearchable things you do not know.'

verses.esv: 8 for at one time you were darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Walk as children of light
verses.kjv: 8 For ye were sometimes darkness, but now are ye light in the Lord: walk as children of light:
verses.niv: 8 For you were once darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Live as children of light

verses.esv: 16 “For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.kjv: 16 For God so loved the world, that he gave his only begotten Son, that whosoever believeth in him should not perish, but have everlasting life.
verses.niv: 16 "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

verses.esv: 24 For this my son was dead, and is alive again; he was lost, and is found.’ And they began to celebrate.
verses.kjv: 24 For this my son was dead, and is alive again; he was lost, and is found. And they began to be merry.
verses.niv: 24 For this son of mine was dead and is alive again; he was lost and is found.' So they began to celebrate.

verses.esv: 33 But seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness, and all these things will be added to you.
verses.kjv: 33 But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you.
verses.niv: 33 But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.

verses.esv: 16 All Scripture is breathed out by God and profitable for teaching, for reproof, for correction, and for training in righteousness,
verses.kjv: 16 All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
verses.niv: 16 All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness,

verses.esv:
11   Seek the LORD and his strength;
    seek his presence continually!
verses.kjv: 11 Seek the LORD and his strength, seek his face continually.
verses.niv: 11 Look to the LORD and his strength; seek his face always.

verses.esv: 20 For his invisible attributes, namely, his eternal power and divine nature, have been clearly perceived, ever since the creation of the world, in the things that have been made. So they are without excuse.
verses.kjv: 20 For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen, being understood by the things that are made, even his eternal power and Godhead; so that they are without excuse:
verses.niv: 20 For since the creation of the world God's invisible qualities--his eternal power and divine nature--have been clearly seen, being understood from what has been made, so that men are without excuse.

verses.esv: 17 So faith comes from hearing, and hearing through the word of Christ.
verses.kjv: 17 So then faith cometh by hearing, and hearing by the word of God.
verses.niv: 17 Consequently, faith comes from hearing the message, and the message is heard through the word of Christ.

verses.esv: 17 By this is love perfected with us, so that we may have confidence for the day of judgment, because as he is so also are we in this world.
verses.kjv: 17 Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.
verses.niv: 17 In this way, love is made complete among us so that we will have confidence on the day of judgment, because in this world we are like him.

verses.esv:
A Psalm of David.

23:1   The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want.
2     He makes me lie down in green pastures.
  He leads me beside still waters.
3     He restores my soul.
  He leads me in paths of righteousness
    for his name’s sake.
4   Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death,
    I will fear no evil,
  for you are with me;
    your rod and your staff,
    they comfort me.
5   You prepare a table before me
    in the presence of my enemies;
  you anoint my head with oil;
    my cup overflows.
6   Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me
    all the days of my life,
  and I shall dwell in the house of the LORD
    forever.
verses.kjv: 1 The LORD is my shepherd; I shall not want. 2 He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters. 3 He restoreth my soul: he leadeth me in the paths of righteousness for his name’s sake. 4 Yea, though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil: for thou art with me; thy rod and thy staff they comfort me. 5 Thou preparest a table before me in the presence of mine enemies: thou anointest my head with oil; my cup runneth over. 6 Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life: and I will dwell in the house of the LORD for ever.
verses.niv: 1 The LORD is my shepherd, I shall not be in want. 2 He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters, 3 he restores my soul. He guides me in paths of righteousness for his name's sake. 4 Even though I walk through the valley of the shadow of death, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me. 5 You prepare a table before me in the presence of my enemies. You anoint my head with oil; my cup overflows. 6 Surely goodness and love will follow me all the days of my life, and I will dwell in the house of the LORD forever.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.

verses.esv:
17   The LORD your God is in your midst,
    a mighty one who will save;
  he will rejoice over you with gladness;
    he will quiet you by his love;
  he will exult over you with loud singing.
verses.kjv: 17 The LORD thy God in the midst of thee is mighty; he will save, he will rejoice over thee with joy; he will rest in his love, he will joy over thee with singing.
verses.niv: 17 The LORD your God is with you, he is mighty to save. He will take great delight in you, he will quiet you with his love, he will rejoice over you with singing."

verses.esv: 13 No temptation has overtaken you that is not common to man. God is faithful, and he will not let you be tempted beyond your ability, but with the temptation he will also provide the way of escape, that you may be able to endure it.
verses.kjv: 13 There hath no temptation taken you but such as is common to man: but God is faithful, who will not suffer you to be tempted above that ye are able; but will with the temptation also make a way to escape, that ye may be able to bear it.
verses.niv: 13 No temptation has seized you except what is common to man. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can stand up under it.

verses.esv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask God, who gives generously to all without reproach, and it will be given him.
verses.kjv: 5 If any of you lack wisdom, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraideth not; and it shall be given him.
verses.niv: 5 If any of you lacks wisdom, he should ask God, who gives generously to all without finding fault, and it will be given to him.

verses.esv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.
verses.kjv: 27 Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
verses.niv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.

verses.esv: 8 Anyone who does not love does not know God, because God is love.
verses.kjv: 8 He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.
verses.niv: 8 Whoever does not love does not know God, because God is love.

verses.esv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please him, for whoever would draw near to God must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who seek him.
verses.kjv: 6 But without faith it is impossible to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.
verses.niv: 6 And without faith it is impossible to please God, because anyone who comes to him must believe that he exists and that he rewards those who earnestly seek him.

verses.esv: 2 Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
verses.kjv: 2 And be not conformed to this world: but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind, that ye may prove what is that good, and acceptable, and perfect, will of God.
verses.niv: 2 Do not conform any longer to the pattern of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind. Then you will be able to test and approve what God's will is--his good, pleasing and perfect will.
